duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing superior customer service to the customers, assessing their needs, recommending products and/or services, and resolving customer complaints.
Completing basic vehicle service tasks such as tire services, oil changes, battery testing, and maintenance.
Performing store operational tasks such as store opening/closing procedures, unloading store product shipments, and maintaining store displays.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent, valid automobile driver’s license
